## FieldColour.setColours() method

Set a custom colour grid for this field.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setColours(colours: string[], opt_titles?: string[]): FieldColour;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  colours | string\[\] | Array of colours for this block, or null to use default (FieldColour.COLOURS). |
|  opt\_titles | string\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional array of colour tooltips, or null to use default (FieldColour.TITLES). |

<b>Returns:</b>

[FieldColour](./blockly.fieldcolour_class.md)

Returns itself (for method chaining).
